name: Civeo Corporation
description: Civeo Corporation is a leading provider of workforce accommodations and support services, primarily serving the resource sector in North America and Australia. Established in 2014, Civeo specializes in delivering integrated solutions for remote lodging, catering, and facilities management for clients in industries such as oil and gas, mining, and construction. Their modular accommodations, which include lodges, camps, and workforce housing, are designed to meet the needs of workers in remote locations while ensuring comfort and safety. Civeo's commitment to operational excellence is evident in their focus on sustainability, leveraging environmentally friendly practices in their services. The company aims to provide high-quality living environments that enhance the well-being of workers, ensuring their productivity and satisfaction. In addition to accommodations, Civeo offers a range of services including maintenance, logistics, and catering, making them a comprehensive partner for companies operating in remote settings. With a strong emphasis on safety, sustainability, and customer service, Civeo continues to expand its footprint in the workforce accommodation sector, adapting to the evolving demands of its clients.
